pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, July 15, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, July 15, 2017:

Calgary, Alberta

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Calgary, Naheed Nenshi.

Tudor Room
Fairmont Palliser Hotel

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:00 a.m. and present themselves to the lobby

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Marda Loop Communities Association Stampede Breakfast with Minister of Veterans Affairs Kent Hehr.

Marda Loop Communities Association Hall
3130 16 Street SW

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Parkdale Community Stampede Breakfast.

Parkdale Community Centre
3512 5 Avenue NW

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.

12:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit Indian Village at the Calgary Stampede with Minister Hehr.

Indian Village, Stampede Park   

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for Stampeded accredited media
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:15 p.m and present themselves to the east side of Saddledome Bridge

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Calgary Stampede Rodeo Event.

Grandstand, Rodeo Grounds   

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity for Stampede accredited media
